Author: AfterSense
Text: i feel the exact same way. i restrict during the week but over the weekend i can't control myself, probably because i'm at home and not at work and have more time to eat and think about food. i'm using feb as a way to get "back on track", but i'm telling people i can't eat out because i'm not spending any extra money in feb rather than starving myself to lose weight. it also works because the guy i'm seeing it going to be away all feb basically so there's no pressure to get food with him. if you need someone to keep you accountable for the weekend let me know? maybe we can soundboard off each other when things get rough.
